title: Effects of polystyrene nanoplastics on hormonal regulation and glucose metabolism of Pacific whiteleg shrimp (Litopenaeus vannamei)
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3843-3855
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00434E, Paper
Yiming Li, Bihong Zhu, Xiaoyi Zhu, Yucong Ye, Xingguo Liu, Xiaodong Wang, Xuan Che, Yunlong Zhao
High concentration of nanoplastics inhibited serum hormone levels, glucose metabolism related enzyme activity and gene expression. Nanoplastic exposure may have a negative effect on glucose metabolites via inhibition of the pentose phosphate pathway.
